packages.name: alm
packages.description: R wrapper to the almetrics API platform developed by PLoS  API -other publishers have built on this and work out of the box: CrossRef, Copernicus Publishers, and the Public Knowledge Project (PKP)

packages.name: AntWeb
packages.description: Access data from the world's largest ant database. Maintained and developed by the California Academy of Science

packages.name: aRxiv
packages.description: Access to the aRxiv preprint repository

packages.name: bmc
packages.description: An R interface to Biomed Central (BMC) search API and full text XML

packages.name: bold
packages.description: R client for BOLD Systems (Barcode Of Life Database).

packages.name: citeulike
packages.description: R interface to CiteULike

packages.name: clifro
packages.description: An R client for New Zealand's National Climate Database

packages.name: dvn
packages.description: Programmatic interface to the DataVerse Network.

packages.name: ecoengine
packages.description: Retrieve 3+ MM records, checklists and photos from Berkeley's ecoengine

packages.name: ecoretriever
packages.description: R client wrapping the Python Ecoretriever software.

packages.name: elastic
packages.description: An R client for Elasticsearch In early development

packages.name: elife
packages.description: R interface to the eLife API

packages.name: EML
packages.description: An R package for reading, writing, integrating and publishing data using the Ecological Metadata Language (EML) format.

packages.name: fulltext
packages.description: An high level R interface to many different sources for full text (or nearly) scholarly texts, including PLOS, PMC, PeerJ, eLife, arXiv, and many more

packages.name: gender
packages.description: gender is an R package to encode gender based on names and dates of birth

packages.name: geonames
packages.description: Grab data from the GeoNames geographical database which covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames

packages.name: gistr
packages.description: gistr is a light interface to GitHub's gists for R

packages.name: git2r
packages.description: Git bindings from R

packages.name: historydata
packages.description: An R package with datasets of interest to historians. It is primarily intended for pedagogic purposes in teaching historians how to use R

packages.name: IEEER
packages.description: Interface to the IEEE Xplore Gateway

packages.name: neotoma
packages.description: Search for sites and download data for use in analytical workflows of paleoecological research using the Neotoma Paleoecological Database

packages.name: paleobioDB
packages.description: Access data from the Paleobiology Database, a warehouse of paleobiology database

packages.name: pangaear
packages.description: An R client to interact with the Pangaea database.  In early development

packages.name: pleiades
packages.description: Search for and retrieve metadata and spatial location data on archeological places and names from Pleiades.

packages.name: plotly
packages.description: Programmatic interface to the Plot.ly API -construct plots with ggplot2 and push to Plot.ly for an interactive plot with a few lines of code

packages.name: rAltmetric
packages.description: Programmatic interface to article-evel metrics data from Altmetric.com

packages.name: rAvis
packages.description: Download occurrence data for bird species, and associated metadata from ProyectoAvis, a citizen science bird project in Spain.

packages.name: rbefdata
packages.description: Connects to instances of BEFdata portals for collaborative data management (e.g BEF-hina and FUNdiv)

packages.name: rbhl
packages.description: Access full text and metadata on scanned and OCR text for biodiversity literature from Biodiversity Heritage Library

packages.name: rbison
packages.description: R client for USGS's BISON (Biodiversity Information Serving Our Nation).

packages.name: rcrossref
packages.description: An R interface to Crossref metadata search API

packages.name: rdatacite
packages.description: Wrapper to DataCite metadata

packages.name: rdryad
packages.description: Push data to and get data from Dryad a repository of data associated with published scholarly papers. Development pending upcoming API changes.

packages.name: rebi
packages.description: Access to the European PubMed Central database of papers and metadata

packages.name: rebird
packages.description: Search and acquire occurrence records of bird sightings collated in the eBird database

packages.name: rentrez
packages.description: rentrez provides functions that work with the NCBI eutils to search or download data from various NCBI databases

packages.name: reol
packages.description: R client to the Encyclopedia of Life a website and database of data/images/descriptions of species.

packages.name: rfigshare
packages.description: Push data, figures, and text to, and search and retrieve data from, Figshare from R

packages.name: rfishbase
packages.description: Access any fish data from Fishbase.org, including occurrence records, habitat data, and more

packages.name: rfisheries
packages.description: Search and retrieve data from the OpenFisheries.org, currently providing access to global capture fishing landings from the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) of the United Nations

packages.name: rgbif
packages.description: Access more than 400 million species occurrence records from across the globe in one place, from the Global Biodiversity Information Facility

packages.name: rhindawi
packages.description: R interface to the Hindawi Journals metadata and corpus

packages.name: rImpactStory
packages.description: Programmatic interface to ImpactStory

packages.name: rinat
packages.description: A programmatic interface to the API provided by iNaturalist.

packages.name: RMendeley
packages.description: This package is now deprecated. Programmatic interface to the Mendeley network -push up data to Mendeley as well as search and retrieve data from your private data and public Mendeley records. Updates pending upcoming API changes.

packages.name: rmetadata
packages.description: A high level R interface to many different scholarly metadata sources, which will include Crossref, any OAI-MH provider, Digital Public Library of America, Hathi Trust, Europeana, and more

packages.name: rnbn
packages.description: Access to the United Kingdom's National Biodiversity Network data.

packages.name: RNeXML
packages.description: Semantically rich NeXML I/O in R -next generation XML for Phylogenetic data.

packages.name: rnoaa
packages.description: Access climate data from NOAA, including temperature and precipitation, as well as sea ice cover data, and extreme weather events

packages.name: rnpn
packages.description: Access phenological data from US National Phenology Network for plants and animals

packages.name: rorcid
packages.description: A programmatic interface the Orcid.org

packages.name: rpensoft
packages.description: Access to Pensoft journals full text and metadata. Not in active development.

packages.name: rplos
packages.description: Connects to the full-ext API of the Public Library of Science (PLOS). They provide a powerful search engine by exposing Solr search endpoints

packages.name: RSelenium
packages.description: An R client for Selenium Remote WebDriver

packages.name: rsnps
packages.description: Search and retrieve Single Nucleotide Polymorphism data from openSNP, a repository of direct-o-ustomer genetic test results

packages.name: rspringer
packages.description: Full-ext access to Springer journals. Development pending upcoming API changes.

packages.name: rvertnet
packages.description: Access to specimen records for vertebrates across many museums though VertNet

packages.name: rWBclimate
packages.description: Programmatic interface to the World Bank climate data used in the World Bank climate knowledge portal.

packages.name: solr
packages.description: An R client for Apache Solr

packages.name: spocc
packages.description: Collect and map species occurrence data from GBIF, iNaturalist, Ecoengine, AntWeb, eBird, and USGS's BISON.

packages.name: taxize
packages.description: Get taxonomic identifiers from many different databases; taxonomic synonyms; taxonomic hierarchies; retrieve common names, and more. Access to a dozen different sources

packages.name: testdat
packages.description: A test suite to ensure that tabular data are correctly formatted

packages.name: togeojson
packages.description: A package to convert many data formats to geoJSON or Bostock's topoJSON

packages.name: traits
packages.description: A high level R package to acquire species trait data from many sources, including Polytraits, BETTYdb, NCBI, Phylomatic, and more.

packages.name: treeBASE
packages.description: Programmatic interface to Treebase -a database of phylogenetic trees

packages.name: USAboundaries
packages.description: Historical boundaries of the United States. Map the United States (or the colonies that became the United States) on any date from 1629 to 2000. Contains both county and state/territory level polygons.

packages.name: musemeta
packages.description: R Client for Scraping Museum Metadata, including The Metropolitan Museum of Art, the Canadian Science & Technology Museum Corporation, the National Gallery of Art, and the Getty Museum, and more to come

packages.name: rdpla
packages.description: An R client to interact with Digital Public Library of America (DPLA) metadata

packages.name: reuropeana
packages.description: An R client to interact with Europeana metadata
